sense.gloss: to recommend, to endorse (e.g. a candidate), to nominate, to support, to back
to infer (from), to deduce, to gather, to conjecture, to surmise
to think (something) through, to ponder deeply

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓のイントネーションから|↑推↑↓お↓す|に↑少女↑↓しょうじょ↓↑時代↑↓じだい↓はスペイン↑語↑↓ご↓↑圏↑↓けん↓に↑住↑↓す↓んでいたと↑思↑↓おも↓われる。
sdata.e: You can tell by her intonation that she lived in a Spanish speaking country when she was young.
